timeline.bodyText:
Uhh :-)
I need to find out if this works already with openSUSE and current SLE version.
This also reminds me, that we need to implement these metadata parsing and re-generate in reposync and taskomatic.
timeline.author: mcalmer
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -33,7 +33,8 @@ Requires:       susemanager-build-keys-web >= 12.0.1
 BuildRequires:  python3-pytest
 BuildRequires:  python3-mock
 BuildRequires:  python3-salt
-Requires:       python3-PyYAML >= 5.1
+# Different package names for SUSE and RHEL:
+Requires:       (python3-PyYAML >= 5.1 or python3-pyyaml >= 5.1)

replies.bodyText:
This works on Leap 15.2 (builds on copr and installs with the python-PyYAML dependency): https://copr.fedorainfracloud.org/coprs/sbluhm/uyuni-server/build/1775065/
Can you explain what you mean by metadata parsing amd re-generating? I would consider this in my spacewalk-java update and see if I can find it in reposync.
replies.author: sbluhm

replies.bodyText: It is supported since SLE15 GA and it seems we have chances that such packages works also out of the box with uyuni. So let's give it a try.
replies.author: mcalmer

replies.bodyText: Interesting, I just had a different attempt failing on an OBS build. might have been a wrong syntax on that. Definitely worth monitoring.
replies.author: sbluhm
